name: Randapi
description: An API to export REDCap randomization functionality and perform additional actions associated with randomization.

versions.0.0.2: use tokens to validate API privileges

versions.0.0.3: action to count number of available records in the allocation table

versions.0.0.4: Fix for issue https://github.com/redcapuzgent/randapi/issues/6, update phpcap to 0.3.3
